text: Summer of '42 is a 1971 American teen romantic drama movie directed by Robert Mulligan and starring Jennifer O'Neill, Gary Grimes, Jerry Houser, Christopher Norris, Lou Frizzell. It was distributed by Warner Bros. and won an Academy Award in 1972 and was nominated for 3 Oscars. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1971 romantic drama movies Category:1970s biographical movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American teen movies Category:American biographical movies Category:Movies directed by Robert Mulligan Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies set in the 1940s Category:Movies about vacationing Category:Movies about virginity Category:Movies about puberty Category:Movies set on beaches Category:Movies set in Massachusetts Category:1970s teen movies Category:1970s English- language movies Category:World War II movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:Academy Award winning movies
title: Summer of '42
